title: The New Muslim's Guide to Islam
author: Jamaal al-Din M. Zarabozo
description: A comprehensive guide for new Muslims covering the fundamentals of Islamic faith and practice. This book provides essential knowledge about the pillars of Islam, Islamic beliefs, worship practices, and practical guidance for living as a Muslim in modern society.

title: What Islam Is All About
author: Yahiya Emerick
description: An easy-to-understand introduction to Islam for new Muslims and those interested in learning about the faith. Written in accessible language, this book covers Islamic history, beliefs, practices, and answers common questions about Islam.

title: Islamic Prayer Made Simple
author: Abdul Rahman Al-Sheha
description: Step-by-step guide to Islamic prayer with illustrations and explanations for beginners. This practical manual teaches the proper way to perform ablution, the five daily prayers, and includes common supplications and etiquettes.

title: The Beautiful Teachings of Islam
author: Abdur-Rahman Abdul-Khaliq
description: Explores the beautiful aspects of Islamic teachings and their practical applications in daily life. This inspiring book covers Islamic ethics, character development, and how Islamic principles can bring peace and happiness to one's life.
